elements.name: Instruction Text
elements.text: Note: Centralized Consolidated Recycling Center (CCRC) forms and Non-Radiological Determination Form (A-6005-944) or equivalent to be completed and submitted prior to material pickup. See http://web.hmis.rl.gov/ma/page.cfm/Environmental/ProgramRegulatoryCompliance/CCRC/Shipment_Forms for forms.
